solution_line_template: The band played {first_set_songs} + {second_set_songs} = <<{first_set_songs}+{second_set_songs}={songs_first_two_sets}>>{songs_first_two_sets} songs in their first two sets.
They have {total_songs} - {songs_first_two_sets} = <<{total_songs}-{songs_first_two_sets}={songs_left_after_two_sets}>>{songs_left_after_two_sets} songs left for the third set, fourth set and encore.

Since they played {encore_songs} songs in the encore, they have {songs_left_after_two_sets} - {encore_songs} = <<{songs_left_after_two_sets}-{encore_songs}={songs_for_third_and_fourth}>>{songs_for_third_and_fourth} songs to play on the third and fourth sets

They will play {songs_for_third_and_fourth} / {sets_remaining} = <<{songs_for_third_and_fourth}/{sets_remaining}={average_songs_per_set}>>{average_songs_per_set} songs on average over the third and fourth sets.
